Description: Rectangular wooden coffin; painted Hieroglyphic text and eye-panel.
Curator's comments: Contain(s)/ed 1895,0716.3 Published: PM IV: p. 268 S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p.38 [3].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
